@myderr Ah, this feature hasn't been added yet, I quickly put it together last night, I'll work on it later, you can submit an issue if you have time.

It is recommended to be able to choose fonts, and offer multiple options for background images, so that various styles of wallpapers can be generated. This kind of demand should be quite high during the New Year period.
